name: Straight bow Anim excepteur in labore laborum eiusmod eiusmod veniam cupidatat enim minim culpa elit sit

steps.name: Scale in G in 8ves
steps.desc: 3 8ves up and down. One 8ve per bow. Do not pause on top note.

steps.name: Weight without vibrato
steps.desc: Complete (see video and instruction sheet) WITHOUT VIBRATO
